text: ۞فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٞۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّي مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

translation.en: And Lot believed him. [Abraham] said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to [the service of] my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
translation.id: Maka Luṭ membenarkan (kenabian Ibrahim). Dan dia (Ibrahim) berkata, "Sesungguhnya aku harus berpindah ke (tempat yang diperintahkan) Tuhanku; sungguh, Dialah Yang Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana
